name: Bugging Mr. Noggin
description:
PUZZLING YOUR WAY OUT WITH A TINY FLYING FRIEND USING MOUSE/FINGER TO DRAG AND DROP SHAPES TOGETHER

Play 10 times to get something nice ;)

This game is made for Trijam#208 under three hours (/ person)

How we used our time:

Jesse Taikina-aho, mechanics 3h

NANIMOON, art 2.5h

Jarsa & NANIMOON, voice-acting 0.5h
